title: Best of The Herd: 11/26/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/26/2019
description:
Colin responds to all the people questioning if Lamar Jackson is sustainable by reminding them that nothing in the NFL is sustainable outside of New England. He thinks Jason Garrett is not detail oriented and looks worse than he really is against a guy who obsesses over every detail like Bill Belichick. Former Steelers and Patriots LB James Harrison talks with Colin about how good the Ravens look and why playing for Belichick is so different. Plus, Colin reveals his top ten teams in the NFL in the Herd Hierarchy including one NFC contender he is not all in on.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
